comment: It is incredibly rare to see a professor who so genuinely cares about learning as much as Dr. T does. If you chose to take her class, which I highly recommend you do, you will have all the necessary resources to fully understand the course material and succeed in the class. She is caring, passionate, and invested in each student, but is not easy!
H

This is a hard class. She lets you know on the first day, but its easy to get confused because of her upbeat personality. She is a very tough grader and her class is quite difficult if you arent an auditory learner. I got an A in AP psych and passed the AP test. This was one of my best sections, but I was failing this class, dropped before test.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Skip class? You won't pass.--Tough grader

comment: This was the worst professor I have ever taken. She is rude and grades very hard. I have never had any trouble in any other classes except this one. She makes class optional but it should be mandatory. She is not somebody I would recommend.

This was the most unnecessarily hard class ever. Homework due every single day, weekends included. Expects you to spend 8 hours a day on just this class. Whenever you ask a question she doesn't just answer it, she has to have a snarky comment or reference to go with it. Homework is way too much and doesn't aid in retaining any information.

I really enjoyed Professor Taglialetelas personality. She doesnt make attendance a grade but if you dont go you will fail. She tests you on things she says during class as opposed to things on the powerpoints. Her test are extremely difficult I failed almost all of them but the labs and online quizzes helped me pass. A lot of effort is required.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Test heavy--Tough grader

comment: She's a sweet lady, but her test are CRAZY! I usually get A's and B's on exams, with her I could barely get above a C, she grades unnecessarily harsh too. Her exams in my opinion aren't realistic, she's one of those "if its easy for me, then it should be easy for everyone" types. She doesn't give study guides either
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Test heavy--Tough grader

comment: Shes awful. Harsh. And will grade you at unrealistic standards. I suggest dont take unless you want a significant dip in your GPA.

Dr Tag is very energetic and a hilarious professor. I was mislead by her energetic lectures thinking she would be understanding and lenient. WRONG. She is an extremely tough grader and does not care if you're failing she will continue to fail every assignment. Do not take this class if you fold under pressure.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--Tough grader

comment: She teaches very well, but her Exam grading is ridiculous. Tests are extremely hard. She makes you do a writing portion worth a month of work in 2 weeks. If you do not answer her questions on the Test like she says in class, you will fail. This course is the hardest one you will take, and she makes it harder than it should be. Does not care at all.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Test heavy--Tough grader

comment: Great professor. However, the amount of work she gives is CRAZY. I am not kidding. We had over 10 online quizzes, 4 in class, a huge research paper, 5 exams (one being a cumulative final), and a lot of in class assignments. If you want to actually LEARN, take her. But be ready. Good luck if youre bold enough to not get the 3 required textbooks.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: AMAZING!!! Favorite psych professor EVER! I had her for an 8AM and she is filled with so much energy--awesome way to start your day! Her fun energy is contagious. She makes the material easy to understand. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!

Love Dr. T! It's very hard to make an A in her class. She doesn't give you a grade she makes you earn it. I learned a lot from her last semester. She is very approachable and wants you to succeed but she WILL NOT just give it to you. I'll take her again! Highly recommend.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: If you want to LEARN, take her.  If you want an easy A (some do), loos elsewhere.  She's got a great personality and is very good at teaching this stuff.  She is very approachable.  Her tests were overly difficult, for the sake of being difficult which I did not like.  I learned the stuff... my grade didn't always reflect that though.

I absolutely love Dr. Tag! Her class is far from easy, but I have never learned this much from a professor. Its very difficult to make an A in her class. She has such a fun personality and genuinely cares about her students and what she teaches. Would highly recommend!
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious

comment: Prof. T. is honestly incredible and has so much spunk! Even though lecture classes are long, she makes them incredibly fun and entertaining! She also gives great and thorough feedback and all of your writing assignments. There are 4 tests and one final, all cumulative. There is also one quiz, one activity, and one homework assignment per "module."
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Clear grading criteria

comment: Dr. T is the best professor I have ever taken. She is tough but it's only bc she wants you to actually learn. There are 4 modules, each has a homework assignment, activity, a quiz and a test; plus there are multiple writing assignments & a final. All test are cumulative. She is amazing professor & I would recommend taking her at any given chance.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--TEST HEAVY--Amazing lectures

comment: She is an amazing professor! However she does not do handouts, you get what you earn. She is more than willing to help, but also wants you to attempt to understand what you missed on assignments. Once again she is more than willing to help and makes class fun!
Amazing teacher and inspiring psychologist. Take her if you want to learn and work hard.

Dr. Tag is a phenomenal teacher. Best professor I have ever had. She will NOT give you any points you have not earned - no extra credit. She has standards and no one is an exception. She's a very charismatic and passionate professor who cares deeply for her students. Makes learning fun, memorable, inspiring. Take her If you genuinely want to learn.

One of the most difficult classes I've taken. Amazing teacher but very difficult.  Grades writing assignments with a fine-tooth comb. Her course expectations are at graduate level rather than undergrad. Tests are really hard, lots of assignments. Very approachable and helpful, just SUPER  high standards.

Dr. Tag is an amazing professor. I took her for both Research and Experimental. The classes are a LOT of work, but Dr. Tag tells you what needs to be done to pass the class. She makes sure you are understanding the material in class and is willing to help you understand if you don't. Plus, her upbeat personality  makes class more fun!

Dr. Tag is easily one of the best professors I've ever taken. Her class definitely isn't easy, but I learned so much, including how to apply myself and my prior knowledge. The material can seem overwhelming, but she does an excellent job of instructing, explaining, and being totally willing to help more outside of class if needed.

This class is definitely tough, but she makes every class really interesting! You have to study hard for the tests, but I've found that I really understand the material because of the tests and she gives you everything you need to succeed! She is really caring, passionate about this course, and willing to help! Probably my favorite teacher at KSU!
She is extremely difficult, Expects the most and test are hard. Her level of teaching is awesome but she don't care about failing you. I would avoid her if possible.
She is a very tough teacher. She expects a lot. She explains the material well but she grades very hard. Take her if you are willing to put in the effort.
I honestly don't know how her average on here is so high. She take forever to grade anything, grades everything extremely tough, and has a very fake personality. I will NEVER take her again.

Dr. Tag is very smart and energetic. She has a quirky sense of humor, but you can't help but laugh at her. She's very engaging and likes to bring real life examples to the lessons. The class is hard, but can be an easy A or B class if you stay on top of reading the chapters. Lots of quizzes and lab assigns. to give you chances to make a good grade.

OK. I absolutely love Dr. Tag. She is very smart and very funny. She is one of the best teachers I have ever had because she is very interested in making sure her students understand the material. Take her! BUT this class is soo soo hard! Form study groups! But you will love Dr. Tag.

I LOVED Dr. T. I took her for Learning and Behavior online. She is VERY helpful and quick to respond; she is receptive to questions and will answer them in full detail (she never makes you feel stupid for asking!).  The tests are hard (as are the quizzes), you MUST read and go over her PPTs (I suggest printing them). Half essay tests.

Dr. Tag is awesome.  Research methods is VERY, VERY tough!  She knows this though, and explains things very well, and even refers a lot to pop culture and humor to help us understand.  She is always there for you and is very open to helping you in anyway possible.  Great person and professor, need more like her!!!!

Dr. Tag is awesome. Research Methods is difficult in general, but she teaches it well. The hardest part about her class were her tests. They could be subjective and tricky. I would take her again for sure!
the most fabulous teacher i ever met. I respected her, so i came to see her, when i decided to changed my mind. She was happy for me! How many professors do that?

Dr. T is a great teacher. However her classes are pretty hard and she grades very hard too. Its good to have a teacher like this tho to help you get prepared for grad school. She is a stickler for APA! She is EXTREMELY helpful and breaks the info down to make it easy to understand. I took her for the research sequence also and she was VERY helpful!

Learning & Behavior was a really difficult course. I did well in the class, but I worked very hard for it. Dr. Taglialatea is very helpful and the way she describes the material makes it much easier to understand. Don't take this class if you aren't ready to work for your grade.

Go to class everyday and you'll barely need the textbooks. Dr. Tag is crystal clear, enthusiastic and very funny. MARK MY WORDS: She is a stickler for APA formatting and you WILL lose countless points if you're not meticulous. Also, double check everything she marks wrong, I found several errors during the semester. Trust me, you need those points!

I've taken Dr. T 3 times now, and earned A's in all of the classes. Her tests are VERY hard, and require hours of studying. If you take good notes and pay attention you can get an A. Make sure to put lots of details on the essays. Very funny teacher too! I recommend her to all.

By far the hardest prof. I have ever had. 10 Quizzes, 4 exams, 1 cumulative final.But she is also the BEST prof. I have ever had. I will be able to use knowledge learned for years to come.  forces you to learn not to memorize.  Engages the class, great teaching style

Dr. T is tough but she's worth it! I learned so much in her classes (I took her for the whole sequence) and she's so much fun during class! She makes difficult material easier to swallow with funny powerpoints and helpful answers. I suggest everyone take her! She's awesome!

Dr. T is so great! Research Methods is HARD but she tries to make it as clear as possible. She's funny and easy to talk to. She'll help you with content, writing assignments, exams, etc. She's cool, take her!
